item.title: By: uruloki

item.description: Forget the 10/10. He just set a new standard: 11/10. My coworkers are now looking at me strangely since I laughed so hard.

item.description: [...] I was just checking out this one post at https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/archives/2006/01/05/player-seeks-advice/. It has this funny thing from the World of Wacraft forums about this guy who thinks his girlfriend is cheating on him. Go check it out. [...]

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description:
Fantastic. I was thinking, "what a sad sad person" while reading, the end really caught me by suprise. Well done. Oh, he should re-roll.
Nerf Shaman!
